mapper.select: select Sms_Interface,Sms_SerialNumber,Sms_Password from Sms_Settings where Statu = 1 and Sms_Interface_Type=0 order by Opt_Date desc limit 0,1
SELECT mf.Msg_Detail FROM Member_SmsSend_Set mss LEFT JOIN Message_Format mf ON mf.Type_ID=mss.Type_ID WHERE mss.Member_ID = #{memberID} AND mss.Statu = 1 AND mss.Type_ID = #{typeId};
select Smtpservice smtpservice,Port_Number port_Number,Email_Address email_Address, Email_Password email_Password from Mail_Settings limit 1
